divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking on the beach and saw this green ball over the ocean it shot straight up in the sky leaving a streek of green behind it..it looked like it went into space cause i saw a thing that looked like a star or plane flying at a high rate of speed and then disapeered south east of my location. this is very strange and is similar to another sighting i had a few weeks back
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Vero Beach
There was one other sighting in Vero Beach on or around December 5th 2008
